title: Hexapod Robot
description: A 6-legged walking robot designed for stability and terrain traversal. Features inverse kinematics for smooth movement.

title: Mars Rover Prototype
description: A prototype rover featuring rocker-bogie suspension system for obstacle climbing, similar to NASA designs.

title: Omnidirectional Frisbee Launcher
description: A mobile robot featuring mecanum wheels for agile movement. Designed with a custom spiral gravity-fed magazine and a dual-flywheel launching mechanism for rapid-fire capability. Modeled in SolidWorks.

title: Dual-Axis Solar Tracker
description: Implemented two versions: LDR-based (Light Dependent Resistor) and Wi-Fi enabled for remote monitoring and efficiency tracking.

title: Teacher Attendance Platform
description: A web platform to streamline attendance tracking for educational institutes, reducing paperwork and errors.

title: English Learning Platform
description: Interactive learning management system designed to help students improve English skills through gamified lessons.

title: Android Utility Apps
description: Various Android applications developed using Java/Kotlin, focusing on user utility and material design.

title: 3D CAD Projects
description: Complex mechanical assemblies and parts designed in SolidWorks and Fusion 360 for 3D printing and CNC.

title: STEM Summer Camp
description: Organized and taught a summer curriculum covering LEGO building, Python programming, 3D printing fundamentals, and introductory robotics.
